Player History
Released by Ashburn on 6/18/1975...
Injured on 5/7/1983 with a Fractured Hand, out for 5 weeks...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/1/1985, off Freddie Echandi (CI)...
Sets a new season UBAFowler-Record for RBI with 136 on 9/21/1986...
Won Slick Fielder Award at First Base in 1986...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1989, hitting .565 with 0 HR, 3 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Pontiac on 9/14/1989...
Won World Championship with Troy in 1989...
Won Slick Fielder Award at First Base in 1990...
Signed as a free agent by Pontiac on 2/17/1991 to a 3-year deal worth $2,029,200 per year...
